summary: Well, thats a Nord version of Urag gro-Shub with a little upgrade.
descriptionHtml:
Well, thats a Nord version of Urag gro-Shub with a little upgrade.

I dont like much a Orc as mage and librarian. In the game orcs are a rejected race, so dont make sense keep an orc on Winterhold (in my opinion).

That\'s the changes i have made :

* Race change (Reaally ?) but the hairstyle, voice ,beard and eye color are the same.
* Now, \'\'Urag\'\' uses  the Conjuration Master robes outfit ( Cause if he is wise, it more than obvious he is powerful)
* Orc dagger changed to \'\'Staff of the Storm Atronach\'\'.
* He can conjure all types of Atronachs
* He uses only Lightning spells 

Basically is that. I hope you like it
author: Felankhor
